item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Back by popular demand, This week's location is:
Geronimo
271 Crown St (across the street from BAR, sort of)
New Haven, CT
Phone: 203-777-7700
http://www.geronimoba...

Come join the NHC at Geronimo. For those who haven't been, Geronimo is a Southwestern restaurant and bar, known for it's selection of 100 tequila and "authentic Sante Fe cuisine". The outdoor patio will be open!

SPECIALS

Drinks:
- $3.00 domestic beers
- $4.50 house drinks
- $5.00 Margaritas

Appetizers:
- A selection of complimentary assorted appetizers




Contact is Doug: please email me if you need directions, etc. or call 203-672-4888

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome.

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
